name: Escape from the Lostmoon
description:
Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid Lostmoon,
populated by disaster human colony, where hungry flesh eating zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Chased by hostile creatures he keeps trying to escape.
Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could help on the risky way!
Features:
  • 5 extended level zones
  • various ammunition
  • different combat tactics
  • traps and aggressive environment
  • allied and hostile characters
  • much more!
    If you like old-school platformers and slashers, thats your game
Disclaimer:
Author doesn’t consider available game build as the final version.
It means that fothcoming updates will add new locations, enemies and interactions.
Please, follow this game to stay in touch.
